id.description: The unique identifier of the circuit.

name.description: The name of the circuit, typically used for display purposes.

fullName.description: The full official name of the circuit.

previousNames.description: The previous names used for the circuit.

direction.description: The direction of the current or most recently used configuration of the circuit.

placeName.description: The place name where the circuit is located.

countryId.description: The identifier of the country where the circuit is located.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate where the circuit is located.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate where the circuit is located.

length.description: The length of the current or most recently used configuration of the circuit in kilometers.

turns.description: The number of turns (corners) in the current or most recently used configuration of the circuit.

totalRacesHeld.description: The total number of races held at the circuit.
